title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama CLI and server that lets you run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally on macOS, Linux and Windows.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama; chat, embed, generate completions and pull models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript / TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Deno, Bun and browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that adds Ollama models as LLM and embeddings providers.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface) with model management, code highlighting, RAG and multi-user support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java / Kotlin client for Ollama providing sync/async APIs, streaming, embeddings and tool calling.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; simple interface to chat, generate and pull models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built Go CLI that wraps the Ollama REST API with extra utilities like progress bars and batch operations.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions and chat.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama server and models on Kubernetes clusters.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Lightweight React chatbot component that connects to any Ollama instance via REST.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by Ollama team; use local models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Simple RAG example using Ollama embeddings and LlamaIndex to chat with local PDFs.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js middleware that exposes Ollama endpoints with rate-limiting and API-key auth for production apps.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app adding Ollama chat and embeddings widgets to admin and front-end templates.

title: ollama-nest
summary: NestJS module providing decorators and services to inject Ollama models into TypeScript backends.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community-maintained Rust crate for Ollama with Tokio-based async client and streaming support.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama supporting .NET 6+ with IAsyncEnumerable streaming and dependency injection.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models using slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app integrating Ollama for private and channel-based LLM conversations with thread support.
